definition: (TCM) interrogation, one of the four methods of diagnosis 四診|四诊[si4 zhen3]

sentences.english: Doctor will check the report and take it as assitance for diagnosis.
sentences.chinese: 醫生通過報告，再接合問診，形成最後的診斷結論。

sentences.english: If they have any health trouble, they will ask their private doctors.
sentences.chinese: 如果人們出現健康問題，就要向私人醫生問診。

sentences.english: Within a few months, I was seeing 100 patients a day.
sentences.chinese: 幾個月之內，我每天的問診量就達到100人。

definition: (TCM) diagnosis based on the patient's pulse/to make such a diagnosis
to feel the pulse/to take sb's pulse
Chinese and Western medicine/a doctor trained in Chinese and Western medicine
lit. to prescribe the right medicine for an illness (idiom); fig. to study a problem to find the right way to solve it/to take appropriate steps
waiting to see a doctor/awaiting treatment
consultation (medical)/to meet for diagnosis/(by extension) consultation of different specialists
